name: YOUTH ORGANISATION ALEXIS PRILEP
goal:
Our mission

We aim to promote social inclusion and improve the skills of young people with fewer opportunities through their participation in the process towards a more effective impact through tolerance and by raising awareness of the psychological concept of society, fundamental rights and equity through education.

How we work

We organise and represent activities and work with young people as a way to encourage young people and young adults to speak openly and develop an understanding of educational information for active citizenship with activities in which the main topic is: awareness, equal gender, languages, cinema and creativity, memory, solidarity and social inclusion, diversity and equality.

Goal

Our goal is to encourage the strengthening and recognition of the skills of young people in society through education for youth work. The educational set of young people is improving by providing learning about personal and social competences, cognitive and creative competent experiences that effectively reflect on their values, priorities and goals.


YOUTH ORGANISATION ALEXIS PRILEP is valuing diversity and inclusion of youth with fewer opportunities.
interests: Budget, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue
• Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities
